page.title: 06THE C18 ROAD
page.content: The C18 road runs N out of Petersfield towards Winchester.Built,1820's by Moses Hoper,landlord,after he got Govt go ahead to set up a turnpike (private road trust). The present route winds up Stoner Hill.It enabled stagecoaches to avoid the old & very steep climb that the original,mediaeval,route from Steep to W'chester entailed if they were to avoid the village of Stroud (a stroud was saxon for boggy land) which lay between P'field and W'chester to the W.The C18 is the subject of local protest as juggernauts are doing much damage and are lethal traffic hazard. Locals have asked the Hants CC to put weight & width restrictions on C18. Highways Dept say this is impossible,& suggest that answer is to re-route traffic by altering signposts.Locals are are not satisfed.They say route is too well established for this to work.
